p: O. majorana EO demonstrated an antibiofilm activity on 89.66% of the isolates (26 strains) in addition to the reference strain. Among them, 11 isolates (39.93%) were passed from low-grade positive to biofilm negative, three highly positive biofilm isolates (10.34%) become low-grade positive, and one strain isolated from nasal samples was changed from highly positive to biofilm negative after treatment with O. majorana EO. The percentage of inhibition ranged from 10.29 to 95.91%.
